9) Gravity 

It’s conjecture about how gravity *would* work if it was real. 

A beach ball falls thru the air but floats in water; density and buoyancy dictate how objects behave in different mediums https://t.co/XC8tEGy5kg

8) Time Zones

As the sun makes its circuit across the sky, it lights up different places at different times. 

And remember, it’s a small, local light, not a giant gas ball. So it can’t be seen everywhere at once! https://t.co/cX3fMY0XrF

7) Other Planets

It’s a huge jump of logic to assume planets are spheres, and therefore earth is a sphere

Thanks to modern zoom lenses, we can see that “planets” are actually wandering stars https://t.co/EZthDtJGY8

6) Ride a Plane

Planes can circle the earth, in a east to west route, similar to Magellan’s journey. However, none can circumnavigate north to south, because earth is not a ball.

No curvature is visible from a plane unless it’s thru a curved window or using fisheye lens https://t.co/qrv0AkVwqv

5) Seeing Farther from Higher 

Yes, you see farther from higher on a flat plane!

And the horizon is a straight flat line no matter how high you ascend! https://t.co/7m6TSgOyUr

4) Sticks & Shadows

Discrepancies in shadows are caused by the distance of the object from the sun, or the sun’s movement across the sky.

This isn’t proof of a globe, and I honestly don’t understand how any one could think it is. https://t.co/JM6eMG2j4a

Constellations debunk the globe. We couldn’t see the same stars year-round if we were orbiting thru space.

Globers ask y u can’t c Polaris from Australia, but it’s the same reason u can’t c the Pyramids of Egypt from Brooklyn.

Too far away! https://t.co/gAi3c5Bfh0
